sentences.cn: 一个动作笨拙的高个子少年

sentences.en: Anteaters, so ungainly they appear put together with parts left over from the Creation , bustle about.
sentences.cn: 食蚁兽东窜西钻,姿态笨拙,好像是上帝用创世时剩下的材料拼凑出来的.

sentences.en: But he tends to regard me as an ungainly, trouble causing nuisance.
sentences.cn: 但是他却想把我看作是个一无是处 、 惹事生非的讨厌货.

sentences.en: He could indeed look a little ungainly.
sentences.cn: 可能他看上去的确有点笨拙.

sentences.en: He is as ungainly as a new born calf.
sentences.cn: 他的姿态就象一头初生的牛犊那样笨拙.

sentences.en: He was a tall, ungainly boy of 18.
sentences.cn: 他是个个子高而笨拙的18岁小伙子。

sentences.en: Heavy and ungainly out of water, these reptiles are supremely well adapted swimmers.
sentences.cn: 这种食肉动物在水上沉重而笨拙, 它们非常适应游泳.

sentences.en: I thought him terribly ungainly when he danced.
sentences.cn: 我觉得他跳舞时显得极其笨拙.

sentences.en: It is often an ungainly, comic endeavour.
sentences.cn: 那往往是一种笨拙可笑的尝试.

sentences.en: Not so long ago, this ungainly partnership was faring poorly.
sentences.cn: 不久以前, 这一笨拙的伙伴关系颇不走运.

sentences.en: On land the turtle is ungainly, but in the water it isvery agile.
sentences.cn: 龟在陆地上行动笨拙, 在水里则很灵活.

sentences.en: Paul swam in his ungainly way to the side of the pool.
sentences.cn: 保罗笨拙地游到池子边。

sentences.en: The poems rhyme too determinedly, ungainly as pairs tied together in a three - legged race.
sentences.cn: 这些诗的韵脚硬绑绑的, 象两人各把一条腿绑在一起参加三腿竞走那样笨拙.

sentences.en: The tall man wobbled along ungainly.
sentences.cn: 这高大的男子笨拙地摇晃着向前行进.

sentences.en: What an ungainly creature a giraffe is.
sentences.cn: 长颈鹿长得实在太难看了!

sentences.en: When the ungainly man had left, he remarked hotly to the messenger.
sentences.cn: 看着这个无能的人走开以后, 他气冲冲地对着送信人评头品足起来.

trans.tran_cn: 难看的，不雅的，别扭的，笨拙的
trans.tran_en: moving in a way that does not look graceful
